name: Rainbow Rush
description:
: 

Help an axelotl find and consume large amounts of skittles in outer space! 

After eating enough skittles an evil copy of you is summoned repeating every move you did before. Your previous actions now becomes ur present enemy! The more skittles you eat the more chaos! Do all of this while also pooping rainbows! :D 

This game was made for Mini Jam 111 with the theme of  "Colors^2" and  "You Are Your Own Enemy". 

Controls:

  • Move - WASD, arrows
  • Exit - Esc

Credits:

  • Bananamanhatguy - Programming, Audio
  • Avi_Artz - Graphics
